lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics said forward Kevin Garnett would miss two to three weeks because of a strained muscle behind his right knee. Garnett injured his knee Thursday, when he went up for an alley-oop late in the first half of Boston’s 90-85 loss to the Utah Jazz.
